entry.source: A god once worshipped by the Samurai, the{F801}{F804,5}Kishin {F873,1},{F804,0} has appeared {F801}in the northwestern part of Shinjuku called{F801}Nakano. It has said that if you want to receive{F801}a lesson from it, you should go to the Nakano{F801}Sun Plaza. It was too strong for me to{F801}beat, but I learned a lot from it.{F801}
